game_description: Full Version : https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/4058005747577896/ Familiar to play, yet challenging to master, Candy Puzzle brings fresh mind-bending challenges and unanticipated obstacles to the casual phenomenon loved by everyone! Keep your brain fit and boost your problem-solving skills by mastering the tricky levels based on real-life physics. Tired of mind game? Just sit/stand back and enjoy the cheerful and relaxing game atmosphere of one of the most beautiful game for everyone. === Features === - Easy to challenging levels - 50+ levels in full version - Amazing relaxing music and environment - 90Hz support Note: We will add more levels in future updates
review_1: The game is cool. You have good times playing. The difficult level is a little bity too easy. Shame that it has so few levels on demo, because it's adictive. I recommend to download the demo and start now.
review_2: The premise is fun and the challenge of accomplishing the goal is good! But the sound of the dog on a failed level is so annoying to me that I won't buy the full version.
review_3: I liked the atmosphere, music, and gameplay. Really nice stress-release game. Liked the puzzle as easy to challenging. Going to buy full version
